generated.css: html{box-sizing:border-box;font-family:Nanum Gothic,sans-serif}*,:after,:before{box-sizing:inherit}body{margin:0 auto;background:#fff;background-image:url(1b84c6e4c7b3fbbf35f9307f9d09e6f8.jpg);background-position:50%;background-size:cover}body,body h1{font-size:18px}body h1{padding-left:20px;font-family:Nanum Gothic,sans-serif;font-weight:100}header{background:rgba(0,0,0,.63);height:76px;justify-content:center;position:fixed;top:0;width:100%;z-index:999}header,header .tabs{display:flex;align-items:center}header .tabs{justify-content:space-between;max-width:620px}header .tabs .tab{color:#fff;width:160px;cursor:pointer;margin-right:120px;height:76px;line-height:76px;text-align:center}header .tabs .tab:last-child{margin-right:0}header .tabs .tab:hover{color:hsla(0,0%,100%,.8);border-bottom:6px solid #9370db}header .tabs .selected{border-bottom:6px solid #c3ff38}main{margin:120px auto}main .card{margin:32px auto;background:#eee;box-shadow:0 4px 2px 2px rgba(0,0,0,.2);border-radius:5px;max-width:620px;overflow:hidden;transition:ease-in-out,height .2s ease-in-out}main .card-header{display:inline-block;background:#fff;border-bottom:1px solid #ececec;width:100%}main .card-header .card-header-wrapper{padding:22px 30px}main .display{display:none}main .card-add-wrapper{margin:24px 60px}main .card-add-wrapper .card-add{margin-bottom:24px;padding-bottom:24px;border-bottom:1px solid #d8d8d8}main .card-add-wrapper .card-add .label{display:flex;align-items:center;margin-bottom:12px}main .card-add-wrapper .card-add .label .new-img{width:22px;height:22px;background-size:cover;cursor:pointer}main .card-add-wrapper .card-add .label .comment{background-image:url(2151484ca46e8df2ba460bd50014fd85.svg)}main .card-add-wrapper .card-add .label .file{background-image:url(ea41441b3ae1004fdd2f5fbf7c7db043.svg)}main .card-add-wrapper .card-add .label .date{background-image:url(7b09284d1274bddd486f6008283963ed.svg)}main .card-add-wrapper .card-add .label .add-title{font-size:15px;color:#000;margin-left:16px}main .card-add-wrapper button{font-family:Nanum Gothic,sans-serif;border-radius:5px;border:none;font-size:14px;padding:12px 24px;width:300px;transition:ease-in-out,width .35s ease-in-out}main .card-add-wrapper button:hover{background:#4f2783;color:#c3ff38}main .card-add-wrapper button:focus{width:400px;outline:none;border:2px solid #4f2783}main .card-add-wrapper input[type=file]{position:absolute;width:1px;height:1px;padding:0;margin:-1px;overflow:hidden;clip:rect(0,0,0,0);border:0}main .card-add-wrapper .upload-button{text-align:center;border-radius:5px;font-size:14px;padding:12px 24px;width:300px;transition:ease-in-out,width .35s ease-in-out;background:#fff;cursor:pointer;display:inline-block}main .card-add-wrapper .upload-button:hover{background:#4f2783;color:#c3ff38}main .card-add-wrapper .upload-button:focus{width:400px;outline:none;border:2px solid #4f2783}main .checkbox-label{height:30px;width:30px;display:block;position:relative}main .checkbox-label input{position:absolute;cursor:pointer;opacity:0;top:0;left:0;width:100%;height:100%}main .checkbox-label input:checked+.checkbox-box{background-color:#4f2783}main .checkbox-label input:checked+.checkbox-box:after{border-color:#fff}main .checkbox-label .checkbox-box{width:100%;height:100%;background-color:#eee;border-radius:4px}main .checkbox-label .checkbox-box:hover{background-color:#4f2783}main .checkbox-label .checkbox-box:hover:after{border-color:#fff}main .checkbox-label .checkbox-box:after{content:"";position:absolute;top:4px;left:10px;width:10px;height:18px;border:solid #b9b9b9;border-width:0 3px 3px 0;transform:rotate(45deg)}main input[type=text]{font-family:Nanum Gothic,sans-serif;width:300px;padding:0 0 10px;border:none;color:#4a4a4a;font-size:18px;transition:ease-in-out,width .35s ease-in-out;margin-left:20px}main input[type=text]:focus,main input[type=text]:hover{border-bottom:2px solid #4f2783}main input[type=text]:focus{width:340px;outline:none}main input[type=text] ::placeholder{color:#dfdfdf}main input[type=date]{width:300px;padding:12px 6px;border-radius:5px;border:none;transition:ease-in-out,width .35s ease-in-out}main input[type=date]:focus{width:400px;outline:none;border:2px solid #4f2783}main textarea{font-family:Nanum Gothic,sans-serif;border-radius:5px;width:300px;height:150px;padding:12px;border:none;font-size:14px;color:#4a4a4a;transition:ease-in-out,width .35s ease-in-out}main textarea:focus{width:400px;outline:none;border:2px solid #4f2783}main textarea ::placeholder{color:#dfdfdf}main .btns{display:flex;flex-direction:row;border-radius:0 0 5px 5px;overflow:hidden}main .btns button{font-family:Nanum Gothic,sans-serif;border:none;font-size:16px;padding:16px;width:310px;margin:0}main .btns button:hover{background:#4f2783;color:#c3ff38}main .top{display:flex;justify-content:space-between}main .top .title{justify-content:flex-start}main .top .title,main .top .title-btns{display:flex;flex-direction:row;align-items:center}main .top .title-btns{justify-content:flex-end}main .top .title-btns .tag{width:70px;height:26px;font-size:12px;border-radius:4px;text-align:center;line-height:24px;margin-right:20px}main .top .title-btns .doing{background-color:#c3ff38;color:#4a4a4a}main .top .title-btns .done{background-color:#4f2783;color:#fff}main .top .title-btns .img{width:24px;height:24px;margin-right:20px;background-size:cover;cursor:pointer}main .top .title-btns:last-child{margin-right:0}main .top .title-btns .edit{background-image:url(ace0367bad3cd80f7a950155f12da4d6.svg)}main .top .title-btns .edit:hover{background-image:url(7937dfd46fb57c9f363228e411ceb962.svg)}main .top .title-btns .heart{background-image:url(c7ab7d92dd3caf0071676f556b2c9d88.svg)}main .top .title-btns .heart:hover{background-image:url(80545f6e98c6eadae935091697480458.svg)}main .card-list{background:#fff;margin:12px auto 0;padding:20px 30px;width:620px;box-shadow:0 4px 4px 4px rgba(48,48,48,.171);border-radius:5px}main .card-list:hover{background:hsla(0,0%,100%,.7)}main .card-list .description{display:flex;padding:14px 52px;align-items:center}main .card-list .description .img{width:22px;height:22px;background-size:cover;cursor:pointer}main .card-list .description .comment{background-image:url(2151484ca46e8df2ba460bd50014fd85.svg)}main .card-list .description .file{background-image:url(ea41441b3ae1004fdd2f5fbf7c7db043.svg)}main .card-list .description .date{background-image:url(7b09284d1274bddd486f6008283963ed.svg)}main .card-list .description span{color:#888;font-size:12px;margin:0 10px;line-height:21px;height:22px}main .card-list.doing-card .tag.done,main .card-list.done-card .description,main .card-list.done-card .tag.doing{display:none}
